summary: This is a 2021 email chain between FBI personnel discussing the search for notes from the 2019 search of Jeffrey Epstein's properties. It specifically mentions the discovery of notes from an interview with housekeeper Sonam Dema and questions whether other agents have additional notes from the New York or US Virgin Islands searches.

persons.name: Sonam Dema
persons.context: Identified as a housekeeper interviewed during the original Epstein search in July 2019. An FBI agent found notes from this interview.

events.title: Original Epstein Search
events.description: The original search of Jeffrey Epstein's properties, during which an FBI agent interviewed housekeeper Sonam Dema.

events.title: Discovery of Interview Notes
events.description: An FBI agent finds one page of notes taken during the July 2019 interview with Sonam Dema and emails colleagues about whether to write a formal 302 report or just upload the notes.

keyFacts: An FBI agent discovered one page of notes from a July 2019 interview with Epstein housekeeper Sonam Dema during the original property search.
The email chain from September 2021 shows FBI personnel actively searching for any additional miscellaneous notes from the NY or USVI searches that other squad members might possess.
The agent who found the notes offered to write a formal FBI 302 report, but questioned if uploading the original notes to the Sentinel system was sufficient given the time elapsed.
